name: Core Assault
description:
Core Assault is all about assaulting the levels set by other players, on the offense. 

The game uses bullet time to give you time to think and assault.

Create levels for others to beat or be on the other end of the table and show them who's the best assaulter out there.

------

Controls: 

Gameplay: Use mouse click  and drag to determine the player direction. 

Level Editor: 

enter grid size and click on create grid to create grid.

use  w a s d to move camera.

Select the object you want from the drop down and left click on the "grid" to place. Right click to delete object. you must test and complete your level successfully in order to save and publish it. Save file names must be unique (there should already be a custom level with the name) and consist of alphanumeric characters and start with a letter. In order to test a level it must have a "Player spawn spot" and at least one enemy which can be destroyed( turrets or power core).

The game is inspired by 'Flaming Core' on google play.  We hoped to land a moonshot by making similar mechanics with option to let users create levels for each other.
